title: Textile, ca. 1919
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and voided suppplementary warp pile in a plain satin foundation (velvet)
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Staggered horizontal repeat of large scale stylized roses. Roses are in black on a purple satin ground.
